sentences.en: Competition in the market has led to goods being produced cheaply and a consequent deterioration in quality.
sentences.cn: 市场上的竞争导致了商品的廉价生产,随之质量也下降了.

sentences.en: Derelict inner - city sites could be sold off cheaply for housing.
sentences.cn: 荒废的内城区可以廉价出售用来修建房屋.

sentences.en: From this master disc, plastic discs are stamped out cheaply.
sentences.cn: 从这个总盘很便宜地复制出塑料盘.

sentences.en: I bought those new plates cheaply, and the pretty rose pattern has worn off already!
sentences.cn: 我买的那些新盘子倒是便宜, 不过那美丽的玫瑰花花纹已经磨掉了!

sentences.en: I got it cheaply as its cover was torn.
sentences.cn: 我廉价买下了它,因为它的封皮坏了.

sentences.en: I have found out where to buy vegetables cheaply.
sentences.cn: 我已经发现在哪儿能买到便宜蔬菜了.

sentences.en: I have found the place that fruit is cheaply bought.
sentences.cn: 我找到了廉价买水果的地方.

sentences.en: I reckon you are lucky to have got the house so cheaply.
sentences.cn: 我认为你很幸运能那么便宜买下那幢房子.

sentences.en: I'm sure I could buy this more cheaply somewhere else.
sentences.cn: 我相信我能在别的地方更便宜地买到这种物品。

sentences.en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentences.en: Old bikes can be bought quite cheaply.
sentences.cn: 旧自行车很便宜就能买到.

sentences.en: She bargained with the trader till he sold her the fruit cheaply.
sentences.cn: 她和卖水果的人讨价还价,直到他把水果便宜地卖给了她.

sentences.en: She is an economical housekeeper and feeds her family cheaply.
sentences.cn: 她节约持家,一家人吃得很省.

sentences.en: The vase was sold cheaply because of a fault in the glaze.
sentences.cn: 那花瓶因釉面有残已廉价售出.

sentences.en: When you have your simplified core concept ready, then build that core concept very quickly and cheaply.
sentences.cn: 如果你已经将核心概念简化，那么非常快速并且廉价地构建这一概念。

words.tran_cn: 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的
